Bookkeeping & Accounting services

Bookkeeping is an essential task for any business and Flink Accounting offers a range of bookkeeping services to help companies to keep their financial records organized and up-to-date.

Preparation of Management Accounts

We understand that managing finances and achieving business objectives can be challenging, which is why our team of experts is here to assist you every step of the way.

Preparation of Annual/Quarterly Financial Statements

We understand that managing finances and achieving business objectives can be challenging, which is why our team of experts is here to assist you every step of the way.

Preparation of Consolidated Final Accounts

Consolidated financial statements present the financial information of a parent and its subsidiaries as if they were a single economic entity.
